I started watching the movie but actually it's more than a "slight" problem. They speak in Japanese a lot and without the subs it's hard to watch this.
I've looked on http://www.opensubtitles.org/en but so far the ones I found don't match and can't be used because of different frame rate :(

lol, I finally found a solution. I took the subtitles track from http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5145768/The.Last.Samurai.2003.720p.BluRay.x264-DOWN
and used it for this release.
Even though that one is 5 GiB bigger, unless your nose is right on the screen, you can't tell the difference, quality is the same. So I'm keeping this one, the 7.5 GiB mkv went to the trashcan :D
